com.rockhoppertech.music.modifiers

Class PitchModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.modifiers.AbstractModifier
      • com.rockhoppertech.music.modifiers.PitchModifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Modifier, NoteModifier

    public class PitchModifier
extends AbstractModifier
implements NoteModifier
    Class PitchModifier Modifies the note's pitch MIDI number by the amount. The series provided will wrap.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    Gene De Lisa
    See Also:
    NoteModifier, AbstractModifier
